text: Ecuador has been in 12 Summer Olympic Games. The International Olympic Committee's official abbreviation for Ecuador is ECU. "Official abbreviations" at The Games of the XVIII Olympiad, Tokyo, 1964, [p. 9 of 409 PDF]; retrieved 2012-8-16. ==History== No Ecuadorian team has competed in the Olympic Winter Games. The Ecuadorian National Olympic Committee was formed in 1948 and recognized by the IOC in 1959. ==Medalists== Medal Name Games Sport Event Jefferson Pérez 1996 Atlanta Athletics Men's 20 km walk Jefferson Pérez 2008 Beijing Athletics Men's 20 km walk ==Related pages== * List of IOC country codes == References == ==Other websites == * Ecuador profile at London2012.com Olympics Category:Nations at the Olympics Category:National sports teams of Ecuador
